languages.text: {n}Висирь кивает пустоте за вашей спиной.{/n} "Да... {mf|ему|ей} надо знать о нелюдях культа Хищной звезды, сокрытых под ликом людским, с кровью и плотью, прогоркшими от ксенозаразы. Долго таились враги, ядом своим отравляя жилы и разумы тех, кого жизнь обделила".

{n}The Vizsier nods at the emptiness behind you.{/n} "Yes... It is time {mf|he|she} learned about the Ravenous Star, about the beasts that appear as men, their malignant flesh imbued with xenos filth. Long has the foe lurked, pouring its lies into the minds and veins of the disparaged."
languages.original_text: {n}Висирь кивает пустоте за вашей спиной.{/n} "Да... {mf|ему|ей} надо знать о нелюдях культа Хищной звезды, сокрытых под ликом людским, с кровью и плотью, прогоркшими от ксенозаразы. Долго таились враги, ядом своим отравляя жилы и разумы тех, кого жизнь обделила".

{n}The Vizsier nods at the emptiness behind you.{/n} "Indeed... {mf|He|She} needs to know about the Ravenous Star, about the beasts that masquerade as men, malignant flesh imbued by xeno-filth. Long lurked the foe, pouring their lies into the minds and veins of the disparaged."

{n}The Vizsier nods at the emptiness behind you.{/n} "Yes... It is time {mf|he|she} learned about the Ravenous Star, about the beasts that appear as men, their malignant flesh imbued with xenos filth. Long has the foe lurked, pouring its lies into the minds and veins of the disparaged."

{n}The Vizsier nods at the emptiness behind you.{/n} "Yes... It is time {mf|he|she} learned about the Ravenous Star, about the beasts that appear as men, their malignant flesh imbued with xenos filth. Long has the foe lurked, pouring its lies into the minds and veins of the disparaged."

languages.text: {n}El visir asiente y mira al vacío que tienes detrás.{/n} «Sí... es hora de que aprenda sobre la Estrella Voraz, sobre las bestias que fingen ser hombres, cuya carne está imbuida por escoria xenos. Este enemigo lleva mucho al acecho, inundando con sus mentiras las mentes y las venas de los menos favorecidos».
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier nods at the emptiness behind you.{/n} "Yes... It is time {mf|he|she} learned about the Ravenous Star, about the beasts that appear as men, their malignant flesh imbued with xenos filth. Long has the foe lurked, pouring its lies into the minds and veins of the disparaged."

traits.locale_text: {n}El visir asiente y mira al vacío que tienes detrás.{/n} «Sí... es hora de que aprenda sobre la Estrella Voraz, sobre las bestias que fingen ser hombres, cuya carne está imbuida por escoria xenos. Este enemigo lleva mucho al acecho, inundando con sus mentiras las mentes y las venas de los menos favorecidos».

languages.text: {n}ヴィジールは、こちらの背後にある空間に向かってうなずく。{/n} 「そうだな…そろそろ{mf|彼|彼女}も鴉星のこと、人の姿をした獣のこと、その邪悪な肉に異種族の穢れが染み込んでいることを知る時だな。敵は長い間、身を隠し、蔑まれた者達の心と血液に嘘を注ぎ込んできたのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier nods at the emptiness behind you.{/n} "Yes... It is time {mf|he|she} learned about the Ravenous Star, about the beasts that appear as men, their malignant flesh imbued with xenos filth. Long has the foe lurked, pouring its lies into the minds and veins of the disparaged."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィジールは、こちらの背後にある空間に向かってうなずく。{/n} 「そうだな…そろそろ{mf|彼|彼女}も鴉星のこと、人の姿をした獣のこと、その邪悪な肉に異種族の穢れが染み込んでいることを知る時だな。敵は長い間、身を隠し、蔑まれた者達の心と血液に嘘を注ぎ込んできたのだ」

languages.text: {n}宿老对你身后的虚无点了点头。{/n}“是的……是时候让{mf|他|她}了解饥渴之星的真相了，是时候看到那些披着人皮的怪物的真容了，它们邪恶的肉体充满了异形的污秽。敌人潜伏已久，将谎言注入了被贬黜之人的思想与血脉之中。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier nods at the emptiness behind you.{/n} "Yes... It is time {mf|he|she} learned about the Ravenous Star, about the beasts that appear as men, their malignant flesh imbued with xenos filth. Long has the foe lurked, pouring its lies into the minds and veins of the disparaged."

traits.locale_text: {n}宿老对你身后的虚无点了点头。{/n}“是的……是时候让{mf|他|她}了解饥渴之星的真相了，是时候看到那些披着人皮的怪物的真容了，它们邪恶的肉体充满了异形的污秽。敌人潜伏已久，将谎言注入了被贬黜之人的思想与血脉之中。”

languages.text: {n}Der Wesir nickt in die Leere hinter dir.{/n} "Ja ... Es wird Zeit, dass {mf|er|sie} vom Hungrigen Stern erfährt, von den Bestien, die als Menschen erscheinen, deren böses Fleisch von Xenos-Abschaum durchzogen ist. Lange lag der Feind auf der Lauer und hat seine Lügen in den Verstand und die Venen der Herabgewürdigten gegossen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier nods at the emptiness behind you.{/n} "Yes... It is time {mf|he|she} learned about the Ravenous Star, about the beasts that appear as men, their malignant flesh imbued with xenos filth. Long has the foe lurked, pouring its lies into the minds and veins of the disparaged."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Wesir nickt in die Leere hinter dir.{/n} "Ja ... Es wird Zeit, dass {mf|er|sie} vom Hungrigen Stern erfährt, von den Bestien, die als Menschen erscheinen, deren böses Fleisch von Xenos-Abschaum durchzogen ist. Lange lag der Feind auf der Lauer und hat seine Lügen in den Verstand und die Venen der Herabgewürdigten gegossen."

languages.text: {n}Le vizir fait un signe de tête en direction du vide derrière vous.{/n} « Oui... L'heure est venue de lui parler de l'Étoile vorace et des créatures à la chair maligne imprégnée d'abjections xénos qui se font passer pour des hommes. L'ennemi déverse depuis trop longtemps ses mensonges dans les esprits et le corps des oubliés. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier nods at the emptiness behind you.{/n} "Yes... It is time {mf|he|she} learned about the Ravenous Star, about the beasts that appear as men, their malignant flesh imbued with xenos filth. Long has the foe lurked, pouring its lies into the minds and veins of the disparaged."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vizir fait un signe de tête en direction du vide derrière vous.{/n} « Oui... L'heure est venue de lui parler de l'Étoile vorace et des créatures à la chair maligne imprégnée d'abjections xénos qui se font passer pour des hommes. L'ennemi déverse depuis trop longtemps ses mensonges dans les esprits et le corps des oubliés. »

languages.text: {n}Vezir, başıyla arkandaki boşluğu işaret ediyor.{/n} "Evet... Doymak Bilmez Yıldız'dan, insanların suretine bürünen yaratıklardan, zeno pisliğine bürünmüş menfur etlerinden haberdar olmasının vakti geldi. Düşmanlar nicedir pusuda bekliyor, hor görülenlerin zihinlerine ve damarlarına yalanlarını akıtıyorlar."
languages.original_text: {n}The Vizsier nods at the emptiness behind you.{/n} "Yes... It is time {mf|he|she} learned about the Ravenous Star, about the beasts that appear as men, their malignant flesh imbued with xenos filth. Long has the foe lurked, pouring its lies into the minds and veins of the disparaged."
